svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - March 26 2017

title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 26, 2017" date: "2017-03-26"
Top
• Brendan Eich’s Brave browser announced the Basic Attention Token . Blog post announcement White
paper on how the token cuts out the middleman - ad exchanges Token sale planned - very interesting
project with potential for mainstream adoption
Brendan Eich’s Brave browser announced the Basic Attention Token . Blog post announcement
• White paper on how the token cuts out the middleman - ad exchanges
White paper on how the token cuts out the middleman - ad exchanges
• Token sale planned - very interesting project with potential for mainstream adoption
Token sale planned - very interesting project with potential for mainstream adoption
• Storj is switching to Ethereum WeTrust interviews Storj Yours might follow Storj
Storj is switching to Ethereum
• WeTrust interviews Storj
• Yours might follow Storj
Protocol
• Ethereum JS Ecosystem Updates More on EWASM
Ethereum JS Ecosystem Updates
• More on EWASM
• Yoichi: Fixing safety proof on dynamic validator PoS What he’s probably building next : “automatic
test case generator that takes an on-chain contract and tries to find an input that decreases the
balance [or assertion failure]”
Yoichi: Fixing safety proof on dynamic validator PoS
• What he’s probably building next : “automatic test case generator that takes an on-chain contract
and tries to find an input that decreases the balance [or assertion failure]”
• Vlad Zamfir: Dealing with failure in cryptocurrency
Vlad Zamfir: Dealing with failure in cryptocurrency
• Etherchain’s optimal gas price calculator . Optimal right now is 10 shannon, but avg is 23.
Etherchain’s optimal gas price calculator . Optimal right now is 10 shannon, but avg is 23.
• Solidity produces the same bytecode on Windows, Linux and Emscripten
Solidity produces the same bytecode on Windows, Linux and Emscripten
• Christian Lundkvist: Intro to zk-SNARKs with examples
Christian Lundkvist: Intro to zk-SNARKs with examples
Stuff for Dapp developers
• Nick Johnson’s ENS Launch Postmortem
• Ropsten returns through mining power. Here’s the new Ropsten explorer
• Reitwießner reminder: “ A Solidity compiler warning means that there is something seriously wrong
with your code ”
• Never Use Passwords Again with Ethereum and Metamask
• Be careful using the transfer function for ERC20 tokens
• Proof of Burn to incentivize service requests , but…game theory?
• Truffle 3.2 release
Ecosystem
• You can now run Multi-member Consortium Blockchain Networks on Azure
• For whatever it’s worth: about 1% of Ether has Carbonvoted nearly unanimously to reduce mining
rewards
• Status interviews with John and Hudson from Project Oaken , Auryn from FirstBlood and Jarred Chase
• Etherian weekly issue of exhaustive dapp updates
• Ethereum wiki
Project Updates
• ICONOMI introduces Repayment Program (me)
• Aragon alpha running on Kovan testnet
• Smartpool alpha is live on testnet
• Chronobank public Beta release on Kovan testnet
• Progress on Golem’s UX
Podcast
• Ryan Zurrer and Olaf Carlson-Wee talk Polychain Capital with Arthur Falls
• Melonport’s Mona El Isa chats with FutureTech about Ethereum
• Arthur Falls talks to Joe Reed of MeDAOs and Gabe Mitchell of Ethereum Clothing
• Blockchannel podcast with Numerai’s Richard Craib
Token Sales
• What is REX?
• WeTrust interviews some of their community members
• iEx.ec V irtual Machine Management
• Why it’s tough to game Lunyr
• This week I gave a talk titled “So you wanna be a VC?” about Ethereum’s democratization of both (A)
who gets to be a VC and (B) access to capital. Video to follow soon Right before my talk, Naval
Ravikant goes on a tweetstorm about how Ethereum is disrupting VC, eg this tweet and this one ) The
same day, Fred Wilson says he is “ a true believer. Full stop ” in crypto projects Harvard Business
Review, a few days later: What Initial Coin Offerings Are, and Why VC Firms Care
• Right before my talk, Naval Ravikant goes on a tweetstorm about how Ethereum is disrupting VC, eg
this tweet and this one )
Right before my talk, Naval Ravikant goes on a tweetstorm about how Ethereum is disrupting VC, eg this
tweet and this one )
• The same day, Fred Wilson says he is “ a true believer. Full stop ” in crypto projects
The same day, Fred Wilson says he is “ a true believer. Full stop ” in crypto projects
• Harvard Business Review, a few days later: What Initial Coin Offerings Are, and Why VC Firms Care
Harvard Business Review, a few days later: What Initial Coin Offerings Are, and Why VC Firms Care
MSM mentions
• Bloomberg feature on EEA and “post-Bitcoin”
• Wired on Augur: Forget Bitcoin. The Blockchain Could Reveal What'��s True Today and Tomorrow
• Ethereum in Mashable
• ABC sitcom references Ethereum
General
• Tools and technologies in the Ethereum ecosystem
• Auth0’s Intro to Ethereum smart contracts post
• UN expanding Ethereum program for humanitarian spending
• ING and Mercuria have an energy trading platform on Ethereum Trafigura with Hyperledger PoC for
energy trading
• Trafigura with Hyperledger PoC for energy trading
Dates of note
[For ongoing sales, check previous week ]
• Mar 29 – Lunyr sale begins
• Mar 30 – WeTrust price change
• Mar 31 – Centz sale begins
• April 2 – Matchpool sale begins
• April 5 – Sikoba sale begins, with the an interesting pre-sale twist that is already open
• April 6 – Cosmos sale begins
• April 6 – Humaniq sale begins
• April 10 – Blockchain Capital “bookbuilding” begins
• April 12 – iEx.ec sale begins
• April 15 - Ethbits sale begins
• April 17 – Boscoin sale begins
• April 24-25 – Rice Blockchain for Business conference. [ Registration open]
Bias transparency: if you host a blockchain conference and don’t use Ticketleap for event
registration, I’m much less likely to include your conference.
[I aim for a relatively comprehensive list of Ethereum sales, but make no warranty as to even whether
they are legit; as such, I thus likewise warrant nothing about whether any will produce a satisfactory
return. I have passed the CFA exams , but this is not investment advice. If you’re interested in what
I do, you can find my investing thesis and token sale appreciation strategies in previous
newsletters.]
Errors or additions: weekinethereum@gmail.com
This is quite possibly the part about sharing
Just in case you want to send Ether (or tokens?): 0x96d4F0E75ae86e4c46cD8e9D4AE2F2309bD6Ec45
